entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:36 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: NE 48 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
